long_description: With a keylock nose and a compact size, the pear-shaped Metolius Element locking carabiner is ideal as your everyday belay 'biner for crag and alpine climbing. Pear shape accommodates most belay devices as well as a Munter hitch. Large gate opening eases clip in; asymmetric shape helps ensure proper loading on optimal working axis. Key lock nose won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making the 'biner simple to clip. Screwgate locking method makes this 'biner extremely versatile and easy to use in all conditions.
short_description: With a keylock nose and a compact size, the pear-shaped Metolius Element locking carabiner is ideal as your everyday belay 'biner for crag and alpine climbing.
